p: A mixture of 4′-piperazinoacetophenone III (0.01 mol) and the corresponding aldehyde derivatives IV, namely, 2-cyanobenzaldehyde, 4-cyanobenzaldehyde, 2-flurobenzaldehyde, 3-flurobenzaldehyde, 4-fluro-3-methoxy benzaldehyde, 3-fluroisonicotinaldehyde, 2-hydroxyl-5-nitrobenzaldehyde, and 2-furaldehyde (0.01 mol) was dissolved in 10% alcoholic sodium hydroxide (25 mL) and stirred for 5 h at room temperature. The precipitate was filtered, washed with water, dried, and crystallised from ethanol to give the target compounds Va–h, respectively.
